DOC.brief_title: Risk Stratification Patients With Preserved Ejection Fraction
DOC.detailed_description: 1000 asymptomatic post-MI patient > 40 % , least 40 day till 3 year post-MI , revascularized without need revascularization ( case without evidence ischemia ) enrol . The patient divide two category : 1 . Asymptomatic patient revascularized STEMI ( remain stenosis non culprit vessel < 70 % ) 40 day post-MI ( LVEF > 40 % re-assessed ) 2 . Asymptomatic patient late ( time 40 day ) MI ( initially STEMI-NSTEMI discharge Q-non Q ) LVEF > 40 % right negative stress test right negative stenosis control coronary catheterization All patient undergo non-invasive evaluation ( ECG , Holter monitor 45-min high resolution record ) . In case fulfill least one seven pre-specified criterion undergo program ventricular stimulation ICD implantation ( inducible ) All patient followed-up 3 year sudden cardiac death surrogate ( appropriate ICD activation )
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic patient revascularized STEMI ( remain stenosis non culprit vessel < 70 % ) 40 day postMI ( LVEF > 40 % reassess ) Asymptomatic patient late MI ( initially STEMINSTEMI discharge Qnon Q ) LVEF > 40 % right negative stress test right negative stenosis control coronary catheterization Episodes sustain VT abort SCD 48 hour acute MI phase . Episodes syncope within last 6 month Cancer , liver failure ( cirrhosis ) , endstage renal disease Use antiarrhythmic drug bblockers
